messages.message: Cross-posting from the release channel for visibility - I put together a doc on our Instabase release version scheme (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/pages/925893340/Instabase+Releases). We’re proposing changing our release versions to a deterministic YEAR.MONTH.PATCH numbering scheme rather than our previous YEAR.MAJOR.MINOR scheme. The current release is the same under both scheme’s (21.1.0), but future months will differ.
